articles.title: Asia shares lifted by U.S. futures, oil climbs - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares joined U.S. stock futures in making cautious gains on Monday ahead of U.S. inflation data this week, while the euro touched a seven-year top against the yen amid wagers on European Central Bank tightening.

articles.title: World War II's D-Day: Photos reveal world's largest amphibious invasion - Fox News
articles.description: D-Day — also known as Operation Neptune — was the largest invasion ever assembled. Some 156,000 Allied troops stormed Normandy, France, by sea and air, to liberate Western Europe from Nazi Germany. The D-Day invasion took place on June 6, 1944, nearly a year …

articles.title: Explosions rock Ukraine's capital Kyiv as battle with Russian forces rages on in east - CBC News
articles.description: Russia said its missiles struck tanks sent from eastern Europe early Sunday in the first airstrikes on Ukraine's capital in more than a month, while a Ukrainian official denied military equipment was destroyed.
